data.strFullDescription:
ELDEN RING NIGHTREIGN is a standalone adventure within the ELDEN RING universe, crafted to offer players a new gaming experience by reimagining the game’s core design.

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2622380/extras/972bf4802f054dcecfdd9122f1c9ce41.poster.avif?t=1753977256" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2622380/extras/972bf4802f054dcecfdd9122f1c9ce41.webm?t=1753977256" webp="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2622380/extras/972bf4802f054dcecfdd9122f1c9ce41.webp?t=1753977256"][/imgvid]
[h2]RISE TOGETHER[/h2]
Join forces with other players to take on the creeping night and the dangers within featuring 3-player co-op.

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2622380/extras/8e034953452e672d3d8578e8f7c4463c.poster.avif?t=1753977256" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2622380/extras/8e034953452e672d3d8578e8f7c4463c.webm?t=1753977256" webp="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2622380/extras/8e034953452e672d3d8578e8f7c4463c.webp?t=1753977256"][/imgvid]
[h2]BECOME A HERO[/h2]
Take command of uniquely skilled heroes, each possessing their own abilities and distinct flair. While individually formidable, their skills create powerful synergies when they unite as a team.

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2622380/extras/a8373c3a9b62c78a30d63c0bc8b77708.poster.avif?t=1753977256" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2622380/extras/a8373c3a9b62c78a30d63c0bc8b77708.webm?t=1753977256" webp="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2622380/extras/a8373c3a9b62c78a30d63c0bc8b77708.webp?t=1753977256"][/imgvid]
[h2]TAKE ON THE NIGHT[/h2]
Overcome a relentless environmental threat that sweeps through a land that changes between each game session and defeat the magnificent boss of that night!

*There is also a Deluxe Edition product available. Please be careful not to purchase the same content twice.
data.strSnippet: ELDEN RING NIGHTREIGN is a standalone adventure within the ELDEN RING universe, crafted to offer players a new gaming experience by reimagining the game’s core design.
